verses.verse: Kefa <S%G4074><s%>, an emissary <S%G652><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, to the strangers <S%G3927><s%> scattered <S%G1290><s%> throughout Pontus <S%G4195><s%>, Galatia <S%G1053><s%>, Cappadocia <S%G2587><s%>, Asia <S%G773><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Bithynia <S%G978><s%>,

Elect <S%G1588><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the foreknowledge <S%G4268><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, through <S%G1722><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> `Ovedience <S%G5218><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sprinkling <S%G4473><s%> of the blood <S%G129><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>: Grace <S%G5485><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%>, be multiplied <S%G4129><s%> <S%G5684><s%>.

Blessed <S%G2128><s%> be the 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> YY <S%G2962><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> abundant <S%G4183><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> hath begotten <S%G313><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> again <S%G313><s%> <S%G5660><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> a lively <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>,

To <S%G1519><s%> an inheritance <S%G2817><s%> incorruptible <S%G862><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> undefiled <S%G283><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that fadeth not away <S%G263><s%>, reserved <S%G5083><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>,

Who <S%G3588><s%> are kept <S%G5432><s%> <S%G5746><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> ready <S%G2092><s%> to be revealed <S%G601><s%> <S%G5683><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> time <S%G2540><s%>.

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ye greatly rejoice <S%G21><s%> <S%G5736><s%>, though now <S%G737><s%> for a season <S%G3641><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> need <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5752><s%> be <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, ye are in heaviness <S%G3076><s%> <S%G5685><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> manifold <S%G4164><s%> temptations <S%G3986><s%>:

That <S%G2443><s%> the trial <S%G1383><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, being much <S%G4183><s%> more precious <S%G5093><s%> than of gold <S%G5553><s%> that perisheth <S%G622><s%> <S%G5734><s%>, though <S%G1223><s%> <S%G1161><s%> it be tried <S%G1381><s%> <S%G5746><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%>, might be found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5686><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the appearing <S%G602><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>:

Whom <S%G3739><s%> having <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> seen <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> <S%G5625><s%> <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5631><s%>, ye love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5719><s%>; in <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%>, though now <S%G737><s%> ye see <S%G3708><s%> <S%G5723><s%> him not <S%G3361><s%>, yet <S%G1161><s%> believing <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, ye rejoice <S%G21><s%> <S%G5736><s%> with joy <S%G5479><s%> unspeakable <S%G412><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> full of glory <S%G1392><s%> <S%G5772><s%>:
Receiving <S%G2865><s%> <S%G5734><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, even the salvation <S%G4991><s%> of your souls <S%G5590><s%>.

Of <S%G4012><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> have enquired <S%G1567><s%> <S%G5656><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> searched diligently <S%G1830><s%> <S%G5656><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> prophesied <S%G4395><s%> <S%G5660><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that should come unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>:

Searching <S%G2045><s%> <S%G5723><s%> what <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5101><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> what manner <S%G4169><s%> of time <S%G2540><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> did signify <S%G1213><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, when it testified beforehand <S%G4303><s%> <S%G5740><s%> the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of <S%G1519><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> that should follow <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%>.

Unto whom <S%G3739><s%> it was revealed <S%G601><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> unto themselves <S%G1438><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> unto us <S%G2254><s%> they did minister <S%G1247><s%> <S%G5707><s%> the things <S%G846><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G312><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> reported <S%G312><s%> <S%G5648><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> them that have preached the gospel <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5671><s%> unto you <S%G5209><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> sent down <S%G649><s%> <S%G5651><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; which things <S%G3739><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> desire <S%G1937><s%> <S%G5719><s%> to look <S%G3879><s%> <S%G5658><s%> into <S%G1519><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> gird up <S%G328><s%> <S%G5671><s%> the loins <S%G3751><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> mind <S%G1271><s%>, be sober <S%G3525><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, and hope <S%G1679><s%> <S%G5657><s%> to the end <S%G5049><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> that is to be brought <S%G5342><s%> <S%G5746><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>;

As <S%G5613><s%> `Ovedient <S%G5218><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> fashioning yourselves according to <S%G4964><s%> <S%G5730><s%> the former <S%G4386><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> ignorance <S%G52><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> he which hath called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5660><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%>, so <S%G2532><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5676><s%> ye <S%G846><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> manner of conversation <S%G391><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> ye call on <S%G1941><s%> <S%G5731><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> without respect of persons <S%G678><s%> judgeth <S%G2919><s%> <S%G5723><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> every man's <S%G1538><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>, pass <S%G390><s%> <S%G5649><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> sojourning <S%G3940><s%> here in <S%G1722><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>:

Forasmuch as ye know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5761><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye were <S%G3084><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> redeemed <S%G3084><s%> <S%G5681><s%> with corruptible things <S%G5349><s%>, as silver <S%G694><s%> and <S%G2228><s%> gold <S%G5553><s%>, from <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> vain <S%G3152><s%> conversation <S%G391><s%> received by tradition from your fathers <S%G3970><s%>;

But <S%G235><s%> with the precious <S%G5093><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> of Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> of a lamb <S%G286><s%> without blemish <S%G299><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> without spot <S%G784><s%>:

Who verily <S%G3303><s%> was foreordained <S%G4267><s%> <S%G5772><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> was manifest <S%G5319><s%> <S%G5685><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> these last <S%G2078><s%> times <S%G5550><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>,

Who <S%G3588><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%> do believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G5723><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, that raised <S%G1453><s%> him <S%G846><s%> up <S%G1453><s%> <S%G5660><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5631><s%> him <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>; that <S%G5620><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> might be <S%G1511><s%> <S%G5750><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

Seeing ye have purified <S%G48><s%> <S%G5761><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> obeying <S%G5218><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> unfeigned <S%G505><s%> love of the brethren <S%G5360><s%>, see that ye love <S%G25><s%> <S%G5657><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> with <S%G1537><s%> a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> fervently <S%G1619><s%>:

Being born again <S%G313><s%> <S%G5746><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> corruptible <S%G5349><s%> seed <S%G4701><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of incorruptible <S%G862><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>, which liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> abideth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5723><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>.

For <S%G1360><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> is as <S%G5613><s%> grass <S%G5528><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the flower <S%G438><s%> of grass <S%G5528><s%>. The grass <S%G5528><s%> withereth <S%G3583><s%> <S%G5681><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the flower <S%G438><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> falleth away <S%G1601><s%> <S%G5627><s%>:

But <S%G1161><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> endureth <S%G3306><s%> <S%G5719><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%>. And <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> by the gospel is preached <S%G2097><s%> <S%G5685><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.
